segments.text: Dad , you keep talking about family in New Zealand . Who are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that's your uncle Bill , his wife and two of their daughters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , your uncle Jack is my brother , Bill is my brother-in-law , your mom's brother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So his two daughters are my cousins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , Sarah and Jane are both your cousins although they are step-sisters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sarah is your uncle Bill's older daughter . When she was young , Bill's first wife , Sarah's mom died . Three years later Bill married again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So uncle Bill's wife is Jane's mother but not Sarah's mother . Right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And when are they coming to visit us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They want to travel to Europe next year , and will visit us at the same Ae .
segments.speaker: S2
